div.p: ( A) Detection of terpenes of H. brasiliense essential oils by Vanilin-Sulfuric Acid (VS) spray reagent followed by heating to 110 Â°C; ( B) Antifungal activity of Hedyosmum brasiliense essential oils, developed with n-hexane/acetone (90:10, v/ v), against Cladosporium cladosporioides and C. sphaerospermum. R f 0.67 = strong activity; R f 0.12 = weak activity; FwF = female flowers; FwM = male flowers; LeF = female leaves; LeM = male leaves; N = nystatin.
